goal.ch: 學習資料收集與資料表達
goal.en: Learn how to collect the necessary information and how to represent the infromation correctly and clearly.

outline.ch: 學生做40 ~ 50分鐘與化學有關題目之演講，教師做指導、講解、及提問題。
outline.en: Students give a 50-min. talk for specified topic and answer question at any time.

textbook.ch: 與化學有關之專業雜誌

gradMethod.ch: 針對學生對所講題目之瞭解、材料之準備、及演講之技術評分
gradMethod.en:
evalutes with the six performance
(1) Understanding  the content of the talk.  (2) Power point making  (3) Presentation skill
(4) Time control  (5) attitude toward discussion  (6) Question answer skill

ch.competencies: 具備研究領域之專業知識
可規劃並執行專題研究，並將成果撰寫成論文發表
與不同研究領域人員協調以解決化學課題
具足夠的外語能力可有效的與外籍人士溝通
自我鞭策不斷學習新知識

en.competencies: Be equipped with expertise in specific research disciplines.
Be capable of planning and performing research activity and summarizing results in a published form in the end.
Be initiative to interact with others with different backgrounds and coordinate effort to overcome obstacles.
Be able to communicate with foreigners effectively.
Be self-driven constantly to explore science.

ch: 系所:限化學學系碩士班。年級:限二年級。學號:限單號。
en: Department:MSc in Chemistry only.Year:Second Year only.Student ID:odd numbers Only.
